Highlighted Clause: The parties consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the state courts located in and serving Santa Clara County, California and the federal courts in the Northern District of California.
Plain Language Summary: All legal actions related to this agreement must be brought in the specific courts located in Santa Clara County, California.

Highlighted Clause: Your order form may provide that a renewal term will begin automatically unless either party provides notice of termination at least thirty (30) days prior to the commencement of the next renewal term.
Plain Language Summary: Unless you or the company cancel 30 days before the end of the current term, your subscription will automatically renew for another term.

Highlighted Clause: You and your end users may not access, use, export, re-export, divert, transfer or disclose any portion of the services or any related technical information or materials, directly or indirectly, in violation of export control and sanctions laws.
Plain Language Summary: You cannot use or share any part of the service in a way that breaks export control and sanctions laws.

Highlighted Clause: Zoom may terminate this agreement immediately and retain any fees previously paid by you if you fail to comply with any provision of this agreement.
Plain Language Summary: If you break any part of this agreement, Zoom can end the agreement right away and keep any money you've already paid.

Highlighted Clause: Zoom will exercise commercially reasonable business efforts to provide notice to you of any material changes to this agreement.
Plain Language Summary: Zoom will try to notify you when there are important changes to the terms of the agreement.

Highlighted Clause: If at any time you are not happy with the services, your sole remedy is to cease using the services and follow this termination process.
Plain Language Summary: If you're dissatisfied with the service, your only option is to stop using it and go through the termination process.

Highlighted Clause: Zoom will provide the U.S. export classification(s) applicable to its services upon request.
Plain Language Summary: Zoom can tell you the official U.S. export classification for its services if you ask for it.
